name: Google - cleaner results
description:
cleans your google results (does not remove ads, it's googles way to make money and provide you the service).
-Removes "[translate this page]"
-Removes "Related searches" (at bottom)
-Removes "Related searches" (within searches, verry annoying)
-Removes "hint: search in your language"
-Removes "Related searches" (at top)
-Removes "Sponsored links" and "Your ad here?" text from ads.
